instruction: Describe a trait that would make a person successful in the finance industry.
output: In the finance industry, one of the most important traits for success is a high level of attention to detail. A successful finance professional must be able to interpret complex numerical and textual data, recognize patterns, and spot inconsistencies within those datasets. They must also be able to verify their findings to ensure accuracy. This trait requires an individual to be well-organized, meticulous, and analytical while making decisions.
